00036  * lustre/ptlrpc/llog_client.c
00037  *
00038  * remote api for llog - client side
00039  *
00040  * Author: Andreas Dilger <adilger@clusterfs.com>

00043 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LOG
00044 
00045 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00046 
00047 #include <obd_class.h>
00048 #include <lustre_log.h>
00049 #include <lustre_net.h>
00050 #include <libcfs/list.h>
00051 
00052 #define LLOG_CLIENT_ENTRY(ctxt, imp) do {                             \
00053         mutex_lock(&ctxt->loc_mutex);                             \
00054         if (ctxt->loc_imp) {                                          \
00055                 imp = class_import_get(ctxt->loc_imp);                \
00056         } else {                                                      \
00057                 CERROR("ctxt->loc_imp == NULL for context idx %d."    \
00058                        "Unable to complete MDS/OSS recovery,"         \
00059                        "but I'll try again next time.  Not fatal.\n", \
00060                        ctxt->loc_idx);                                \
00061                 imp = NULL;                                           \
00062                 mutex_unlock(&ctxt->loc_mutex);                   \
00063                 return (-EINVAL);                                     \
00064         }                                                             \
00065         mutex_unlock(&ctxt->loc_mutex);                           \
00066 } while(0)
00067 
00068 #define LLOG_CLIENT_EXIT(ctxt, imp) do {                              \
00069         mutex_lock(&ctxt->loc_mutex);                             \
00070         if (ctxt->loc_imp != imp)                                     \
00071                 CWARN("loc_imp has changed from %p to %p\n",          \
00072                        ctxt->loc_imp, imp);                           \
00073         class_import_put(imp);                                        \
00074         mutex_unlock(&ctxt->loc_mutex);                           \
00075 } while(0)
00076 
00077 /* This is a callback from the llog_* functions.
00078  * Assumes caller has already pushed us into the kernel context. */
00079 static int llog_client_open(const struct lu_env *env,
00080                             struct llog_handle *lgh, struct llog_logid *logid,
00081                             char *name, enum llog_open_param open_param)
00082 {
00083         struct obd_import     *imp;
00084         struct llogd_body     *body;
00085         struct llog_ctxt      *ctxt = lgh->lgh_ctxt;
00086         struct ptlrpc_request *req = NULL;
00087         int                    rc;
00088         ENTRY;
00089 
00090         LLOG_CLIENT_ENTRY(ctxt, imp);
00091 
00092         /* client cannot create llog */
00093         LASSERTF(open_param != LLOG_OPEN_NEW, "%#x\n", open_param);
00094         LASSERT(lgh);
00095 
00096         req = ptlrpc_request_alloc(imp, &RQF_LLOG_ORIGIN_HANDLE_CREATE);
00097         if (req == NULL)
00098                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00099 
00100         if (name)
00101                 req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_NAME, RCL_CLIENT,
00102                                      strlen(name) + 1);
00103 
00104         rc = ptlrpc_request_pack(req, LUSTRE_LOG_VERSION,
00105                                  LLOG_ORIGIN_HANDLE_CREATE);
00106         if (rc) {
00107                 ptlrpc_request_free(req);
00108                 req = NULL;
00109                 GOTO(out, rc);
00110         }
00111         ptlrpc_request_set_replen(req);
00112 
00113         body = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LLOGD_BODY);
00114         if (logid)
00115                 body->lgd_logid = *logid;
00116         body->lgd_ctxt_idx = ctxt->loc_idx - 1;
00117 
00118         if (name) {
00119                 char *tmp;
00120                 tmp = req_capsule_client_sized_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_NAME,
00121                                                    strlen(name) + 1);
00122                 LASSERT(tmp);
00123                 strcpy(tmp, name);
00124         }
00125 
00126         rc = ptlrpc_queue_wait(req);
00127         if (rc)
00128                 GOTO(out, rc);
00129 
00130         body = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LLOGD_BODY);
00131         if (body == NULL)
00132                 GOTO(out, rc = -EFAULT);
00133 
00134         lgh->lgh_id = body->lgd_logid;
00135         lgh->lgh_ctxt = ctxt;
00136         EXIT;
00137 out:
00138         LLOG_CLIENT_EXIT(ctxt, imp);
00139         ptlrpc_req_finished(req);
00140         return rc;
00141 }
00142 
00143 static int llog_client_destroy(const struct lu_env *env,
00144                                struct llog_handle *loghandle,
00145                                struct thandle *th)
00146 {
00147         struct obd_import     *imp;
00148         struct ptlrpc_request *req = NULL;
00149         struct llogd_body     *body;
00150         int                    rc;
00151         ENTRY;
00152 
00153         LLOG_CLIENT_ENTRY(loghandle->lgh_ctxt, imp);
00154         req = ptlrpc_request_alloc_pack(imp, &RQF_LLOG_ORIGIN_HANDLE_DESTROY,
00155                                         LUSTRE_LOG_VERSION,
00156                                         LLOG_ORIGIN_HANDLE_DESTROY);
00157         if (req == NULL)
00158                 GOTO(err_exit, rc =-ENOMEM);
00159 
00160         body = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LLOGD_BODY);
00161         body->lgd_logid = loghandle->lgh_id;
00162         body->lgd_llh_flags = loghandle->lgh_hdr->llh_flags;
00163 
00164         if (!(body->lgd_llh_flags & LLOG_F_IS_PLAIN))
00165                 CERROR("%s: wrong llog flags %x\n", imp->imp_obd->obd_name,
00166                        body->lgd_llh_flags);
00167 
00168         ptlrpc_request_set_replen(req);
00169         rc = ptlrpc_queue_wait(req);
00170 
00171         ptlrpc_req_finished(req);
00172 err_exit:
00173         LLOG_CLIENT_EXIT(loghandle->lgh_ctxt, imp);
00174         RETURN(rc);
00175 }
00176 
00177 
00178 static int llog_client_next_block(const struct lu_env *env,
00179                                   struct llog_handle *loghandle,
00180                                   int *cur_idx, int next_idx,
00181                                   __u64 *cur_offset, void *buf, int len)
00182 {
00183         struct obd_import     *imp;
00184         struct ptlrpc_request *req = NULL;
00185         struct llogd_body     *body;
00186         void                  *ptr;
00187         int                    rc;
00188         ENTRY;
00189 
00190         LLOG_CLIENT_ENTRY(loghandle->lgh_ctxt, imp);
00191         req = ptlrpc_request_alloc_pack(imp, &RQF_LLOG_ORIGIN_HANDLE_NEXT_BLOCK,
00192                                         LUSTRE_LOG_VERSION,
00193                                         LLOG_ORIGIN_HANDLE_NEXT_BLOCK);
00194         if (req == NULL)
00195                 GOTO(err_exit, rc =-ENOMEM);
00196 
00197         body = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LLOGD_BODY);
00198         body->lgd_logid = loghandle->lgh_id;
00199         body->lgd_ctxt_idx = loghandle->lgh_ctxt->loc_idx - 1;
00200         body->lgd_llh_flags = loghandle->lgh_hdr->llh_flags;
00201         body->lgd_index = next_idx;
00202         body->lgd_saved_index = *cur_idx;
00203         body->lgd_len = len;
00204         body->lgd_cur_offset = *cur_offset;
00205 
00206         req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_EADATA, RCL_SERVER, len);
00207         ptlrpc_request_set_replen(req);
00208         rc = ptlrpc_queue_wait(req);
00209         if (rc)
00210                 GOTO(out, rc);
00211 
00212         body = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LLOGD_BODY);
00213         if (body == NULL)
00214                 GOTO(out, rc =-EFAULT);
00215 
00216         /* The log records are swabbed as they are processed */
00217         ptr = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_EADATA);
00218         if (ptr == NULL)
00219                 GOTO(out, rc =-EFAULT);
00220 
00221         *cur_idx = body->lgd_saved_index;
00222         *cur_offset = body->lgd_cur_offset;
00223 
00224         memcpy(buf, ptr, len);
00225         EXIT;
00226 out:
00227         ptlrpc_req_finished(req);
00228 err_exit:
00229         LLOG_CLIENT_EXIT(loghandle->lgh_ctxt, imp);
00230         return rc;
00231 }
00232 
00233 static int llog_client_prev_block(const struct lu_env *env,
00234                                   struct llog_handle *loghandle,
00235                                   int prev_idx, void *buf, int len)
00236 {
00237         struct obd_import     *imp;
00238         struct ptlrpc_request *req = NULL;
00239         struct llogd_body     *body;
00240         void                  *ptr;
00241         int                    rc;
00242         ENTRY;
00243 
00244         LLOG_CLIENT_ENTRY(loghandle->lgh_ctxt, imp);
00245         req = ptlrpc_request_alloc_pack(imp, &RQF_LLOG_ORIGIN_HANDLE_PREV_BLOCK,
00246                                         LUSTRE_LOG_VERSION,
00247                                         LLOG_ORIGIN_HANDLE_PREV_BLOCK);
00248         if (req == NULL)
00249                 GOTO(err_exit, rc = -ENOMEM);
00250 
00251         body = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LLOGD_BODY);
00252         body->lgd_logid = loghandle->lgh_id;
00253         body->lgd_ctxt_idx = loghandle->lgh_ctxt->loc_idx - 1;
00254         body->lgd_llh_flags = loghandle->lgh_hdr->llh_flags;
00255         body->lgd_index = prev_idx;
00256         body->lgd_len = len;
00257 
00258         req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_EADATA, RCL_SERVER, len);
00259         ptlrpc_request_set_replen(req);
00260 
00261         rc = ptlrpc_queue_wait(req);
00262         if (rc)
00263                 GOTO(out, rc);
00264 
00265         body = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LLOGD_BODY);
00266         if (body == NULL)
00267                 GOTO(out, rc =-EFAULT);
00268 
00269         ptr = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_EADATA);
00270         if (ptr == NULL)
00271                 GOTO(out, rc =-EFAULT);
00272 
00273         memcpy(buf, ptr, len);
00274         EXIT;
00275 out:
00276         ptlrpc_req_finished(req);
00277 err_exit:
00278         LLOG_CLIENT_EXIT(loghandle->lgh_ctxt, imp);
00279         return rc;
00280 }
00281 
00282 static int llog_client_read_header(const struct lu_env *env,
00283                                    struct llog_handle *handle)
00284 {
00285         struct obd_import     *imp;
00286         struct ptlrpc_request *req = NULL;
00287         struct llogd_body     *body;
00288         struct llog_log_hdr   *hdr;
00289         struct llog_rec_hdr   *llh_hdr;
00290         int                    rc;
00291         ENTRY;
00292 
00293         LLOG_CLIENT_ENTRY(handle->lgh_ctxt, imp);
00294         req = ptlrpc_request_alloc_pack(imp,&RQF_LLOG_ORIGIN_HANDLE_READ_HEADER,
00295                                         LUSTRE_LOG_VERSION,
00296                                         LLOG_ORIGIN_HANDLE_READ_HEADER);
00297         if (req == NULL)
00298                 GOTO(err_exit, rc = -ENOMEM);
00299 
00300         body = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LLOGD_BODY);
00301         body->lgd_logid = handle->lgh_id;
00302         body->lgd_ctxt_idx = handle->lgh_ctxt->loc_idx - 1;
00303         body->lgd_llh_flags = handle->lgh_hdr->llh_flags;
00304 
00305         ptlrpc_request_set_replen(req);
00306         rc = ptlrpc_queue_wait(req);
00307         if (rc)
00308                 GOTO(out, rc);
00309 
00310         hdr = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LLOG_LOG_HDR);
00311         if (hdr == NULL)
00312                 GOTO(out, rc =-EFAULT);
00313 
00314         if (handle->lgh_hdr_size < hdr->llh_hdr.lrh_len)
00315                 GOTO(out, rc = -EFAULT);
00316 
00317         memcpy(handle->lgh_hdr, hdr, hdr->llh_hdr.lrh_len);
00318         handle->lgh_last_idx = LLOG_HDR_TAIL(handle->lgh_hdr)->lrt_index;
00319 
00320         /* sanity checks */
00321         llh_hdr = &handle->lgh_hdr->llh_hdr;
00322         if (llh_hdr->lrh_type != LLOG_HDR_MAGIC) {
00323                 CERROR("bad log header magic: %#x (expecting %#x)\n",
00324                        llh_hdr->lrh_type, LLOG_HDR_MAGIC);
00325                 rc = -EIO;
00326         } else if (llh_hdr->lrh_len !=
00327                    LLOG_HDR_TAIL(handle->lgh_hdr)->lrt_len ||
00328                    (llh_hdr->lrh_len & (llh_hdr->lrh_len - 1)) != 0 ||
00329                    llh_hdr->lrh_len < LLOG_MIN_CHUNK_SIZE ||
00330                    llh_hdr->lrh_len > handle->lgh_hdr_size) {
00331                 CERROR("incorrectly sized log header: %#x, "
00332                        "expecting %#x (power of two > 8192)\n",
00333                        llh_hdr->lrh_len,
00334                        LLOG_HDR_TAIL(handle->lgh_hdr)->lrt_len);
00335                 CERROR("you may need to re-run lconf --write_conf.\n");
00336                 rc = -EIO;
00337         }
00338         EXIT;
00339 out:
00340         ptlrpc_req_finished(req);
00341 err_exit:
00342         LLOG_CLIENT_EXIT(handle->lgh_ctxt, imp);
00343         return rc;
00344 }
00345 
00346 static int llog_client_close(const struct lu_env *env,
00347                              struct llog_handle *handle)
00348 {
00349         /* this doesn't call LLOG_ORIGIN_HANDLE_CLOSE because
00350            the servers all close the file at the end of every
00351            other LLOG_ RPC. */
00352         return(0);
00353 }
00354 
00355 struct llog_operations llog_client_ops = {
00356         .lop_next_block         = llog_client_next_block,
00357         .lop_prev_block         = llog_client_prev_block,
00358         .lop_read_header        = llog_client_read_header,
00359         .lop_open               = llog_client_open,
00360         .lop_destroy            = llog_client_destroy,
00361         .lop_close              = llog_client_close,
00362 };
00363 EXPORT_SYMBOL(llog_client_ops);
